docs.text: AddDoc AddDoc Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/addDoc Method : POST Description  Use to add a doc doc in the collection collection in the database db Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database": string, "collection": "Name of the collection": string, "doc": "Json of the doc to add": string } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User", "doc": { "user": "user", {...} } } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "added successfully": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid": string } 500 If error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: AddDoc

docs.text: AddDoc Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/addDoc Method : POST
docs.title: AddDoc

docs.text: Use to add a doc doc in the collection collection in the database db Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database": string, "collection": "Name of the collection": string, "doc": "Json of the doc to add": string } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User", "doc": { "user": "user", {...} } }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "added successfully": string }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid": string } 500 If error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: CreateCollection CreateCollection Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/createCollection Method : POST Description  Use to create a collection name in the database db Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database": string, "name": "Name of the collection": string } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "created successfully": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid": string } 500 If error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: GetOneValue GetOneValue Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/createCollection Method : POST Description  Use to get value in the mongoDB when a doc contain the value doc Data constraints { "db": "Name of the database": string, "name": "Name of the collection": string, "doc": "Json that the Doc have to have": {} } Data example { "db": "testDB", "name": "User", doc": { "user": "user", {...} } } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { return of the Mongodatabase } Error Response Status Condition Response 404 If the Db asked doesn't exists { "msg": "${db} is not a DB valid": string } 500 If error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: GetOneValue

docs.text: GetOneValue Description Success Response Error Response URL : /mongoDb/createCollection Method : POST

docs.text: CreateUser CreateUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST Description  Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string, "username": "valid username": string } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User created please verify your email": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: CreateUser

docs.text: CreateUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/createUser Method : POST
docs.title: CreateUser

docs.text: Use to create a user in firebase with email password and username Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string, "username": "valid username": string } Data example { "email": "alexi@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", "username": "alexisFab" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User created please verify your email": string }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 If username , email , password are wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: DeleteUser DeleteUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Data constraints { "tokenID": "TokenID provided by firebase": string } Data example { "tokenID": "4f5sd7gf1k564sdf7..." } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "msg": "User deleted": string } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: DeleteUser

docs.text: DeleteUser Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST

docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: signUserProvider SignUserProvider Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Data constraints { "tokenID": "TokenID provided by firebase": string } Data example { "tokenID": "4f5sd7gf1k564sdf7..." } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } }

docs.text: signUserProvider SignUserProvider Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/deleteUser Method : POST Description  Use to delete a user in firebase with token Data constraints { "tokenID": "TokenID provided by firebase": string, "user": "user settings provided by firebase": {} } Data example { "tokenID": "4f5sd7gf1k564sdf7...", "user": "..." } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error
docs.title: SignUserProvider

docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { ".data": { "email": "email of the user": string, "name": "name of the user": string, "uid": "uid of the user": string, } }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 If uid is wrong or error in firebase firebase error

docs.text: GetAllServices GetAllServices Description Success Response URL : /services/getAll Method : GET Description  Use to get all services available Success Response Code : 200 OK Content List of all services available { "services": [ { "name": "name of the service" : string, "reactions": ["Reaction of the services"] : array, "actions": ["Action of the services"] : array } ] } Reactions and Actions have the same body type as follow: { "name": "Name of the action/reaction" : string, "inputs": /*inputs needed from the action reaction*/ [ { "name": "name of the input" : string, "type": "type of the input" : string } ] }
docs.title: GetAllServices

docs.text: GetAllServices Description Success Response URL : /services/getAll Method : GET
docs.title: GetAllServices

docs.text: Use to get all services available
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content List of all services available { "services": [ { "name": "name of the service" : string, "reactions": ["Reaction of the services"] : array, "actions": ["Action of the services"] : array } ] } Reactions and Actions have the same body type as follow: { "name": "Name of the action/reaction" : string, "inputs": /*inputs needed from the action reaction*/ [ { "name": "name of the input" : string, "type": "type of the input" : string } ] }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: GetService GetService Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET Description  Use to get actions reactions of a user service Data constraints { "tokenID": "'Bearer ' + firebase token ID": string } Data example { "tokenID": "" } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { "id": "ID of the action/reaction": string, "actionService": "Name of the service for the action": string, "actionElement": "Name of the element of the action": string, "inputAction": "Input needed for the service action": string, "reactionService": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionElement": "Name of the element of the reaction": string, "inputReaction": "Input needed for the service reaction": string, } Error Response Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If error from Firebase { "firebaseError": "" }
docs.title: GetService

docs.text: GetService Description Success Response Error Response URL : /services/getUser Method : GET
docs.title: GetService

docs.text: Use to get actions reactions of a user service Data constraints { "tokenID": "'Bearer ' + firebase token ID": string } Data example { "tokenID": "" }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content { "id": "ID of the action/reaction": string, "actionService": "Name of the service for the action": string, "actionElement": "Name of the element of the action": string, "inputAction": "Input needed for the service action": string, "reactionService": "Name of the service for the reaction": string, "reactionElement": "Name of the element of the reaction": string, "inputReaction": "Input needed for the service reaction": string, }
docs.title: Success Response

docs.text: Code : 404 not found Status Condition Response 404 If error from Firebase { "firebaseError": "" }
docs.title: Error Response
